title: Secure Authentication and Access Control
summary: Implement secure login, multi-factor authentication, and access control.
description: Develop a secure authentication system supporting multi-factor authentication (MFA) to prevent unauthorized access. Implement encryption, session management, and password security policies that comply with financial industry standards. Define and enforce role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure that customers only access appropriate modules and data according to their profile and authorization level.

userStories.title: User Login with Multi-Factor Authentication
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to log in securely using multi-factor authentication so that my banking data remains safe.

userStories.title: Password Security Policy
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to set strong passwords and follow password rotation rules so that my account remains protected.

userStories.title: Role-Based Access Management
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to assign access privileges based on user roles so that information and actions are protected per user type.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Develop a user-friendly dashboard displaying personalized information and product recommendations.
description: Design and implement a modern, intuitive dashboard that displays the customer's account overview, transactional summaries, and relevant product offerings based on eligibility. The interface should allow quick access to service requests, notifications, and recommendations to enhance customer engagement and efficiency.

userStories.title: Display Account and Balance Overview
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to see my account details and balances at a glance so that I can manage my finances efficiently.

userStories.title: Show Eligible Banking Products
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to see personalized banking products and services that match my profile so that I can explore relevant options.

userStories.title: Quick Access to Service Requests
userStories.description: As a customer, I want shortcuts to view or initiate service requests directly from the dashboard so that I can perform actions faster.

title: Responsive Design and Accessibility
summary: Ensure a seamless, responsive design across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
description: Implement a responsive, accessible user interface using a modern framework to provide consistent experiences across screens and devices. The interface must adjust automatically to various screen resolutions, maintain branding consistency, and support accessibility standards for inclusive use.

userStories.title: Responsive Layout Implementation
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the portal to function consistently across all my devices so that I can access it anywhere.

userStories.title: Mobile Optimization
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the portal to be optimized for mobile use so that I can complete tasks easily on smaller screens.

userStories.title: Accessibility Compliance
userStories.description: As a customer with accessibility needs, I want the portal to comply with WCAG standards so that I can navigate it effectively.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Requests
summary: Enable online account opening and modification workflows with minimal clicks.
description: Develop guided workflows that enable customers to open new accounts or modify existing services digitally. The processes should include pre-filled personal details, intuitive form validation, and integration with backend systems to streamline submissions and approvals, reducing manual processing time.

userStories.title: Online Account Opening
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to open new bank accounts online so that I can start banking services conveniently.

userStories.title: Service Modification Request Submission
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to request changes to my existing banking services online so that I can manage my accounts without visiting a branch.

userStories.title: Pre-Filled Request Forms
userStories.description: As a customer, I want my personal and financial details pre-filled in service forms so that I can save time when submitting requests.

title: Document Upload and Application Drafts
summary: Provide secure document uploads and draft-saving functionality for incomplete processes.
description: Implement secure file uploads for customers to submit required identification or supporting documents. Enable a draft-saving mechanism allowing users to pause applications and resume later without data loss. Ensure encryption of stored documents and compliance with data protection standards.

userStories.title: Secure Document Upload
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to upload verification documents securely so that my applications can be processed digitally.

userStories.title: Save Incomplete Applications
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to save unfinished applications as drafts so that I can continue later without losing progress.

userStories.title: Resume Draft Application
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to easily find and resume my saved application drafts so that I can finish my submission conveniently.

title: Notification System and Real-Time Status Updates
summary: Implement notifications and status tracking for requests.
description: Develop a notification and communication system to provide real-time updates on the progression of account openings and service requests. Allow customers to track the current status through a dedicated tracking view while also receiving automatic email alerts for significant status changes and completions.

userStories.title: In-Portal Status Tracking
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view the status of my requests so that I can monitor their progress in real time.

userStories.title: Email Notifications for Updates
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to receive email alerts when my requests are updated or approved so that I can stay informed.

userStories.title: Notification History Center
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view all my notification messages in one place so that I can refer to them when needed.

title: Activity History and Audit Trails
summary: Maintain a record of all customer interactions and activities for review and compliance.
description: Implement an activity tracking feature to store a detailed history of all customer actions including login attempts, service submissions, and document uploads. Provide customers with a view of their historical activities and enable administrators to generate audit reports for compliance and query resolution.

userStories.title: View Banking Interaction History
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to see my historical records of services and requests so that I can track my banking activities.

userStories.title: System Audit Log Records
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to review detailed activity logs so that I can ensure compliance and trace customer actions if needed.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core banking system for real-time operations.
description: Develop API integrations and middleware layers to enable real-time data synchronization and workflow automation between the self-service portal and the bank’s existing core systems. Ensure transaction consistency and minimize latency for all customer-initiated requests and data retrievals.

userStories.title: Real-Time Core System Sync
userStories.description: As a customer, I want my portal data to reflect updates from the bank’s core system in real time so that information stays consistent.

userStories.title: Data Exchange via Secure APIs
userStories.description: As a developer, I want secure APIs connecting the portal to core banking systems so that requests and transactions are processed efficiently.

title: Portal Database Architecture and Performance
summary: Build an optimized, independent portal database for high performance and reliability.
description: Design a dedicated, scalable database to handle portal-specific data independently of the core banking system. Implement caching mechanisms, load balancing, and efficient backup strategies to ensure reliability, performance optimization, and disaster recovery capabilities.

userStories.title: Independent Database Setup
userStories.description: As a system architect, I want a standalone portal database so that performance remains stable and isolated from core banking operations.

userStories.title: Database Optimization and Backup
userStories.description: As a system administrator, I want optimized database queries and regular backups so that data retrieval is fast and reliable.

title: Security and Data Compliance
summary: Ensure end-to-end encryption and data protection compliance across the portal.
description: Establish end-to-end encryption across all data exchanges, implement intrusion detection mechanisms, and ensure compliance with local data protection regulations (GDPR, PCI-DSS, etc.). Maintain security audits and vulnerability testing for ongoing system safety.

userStories.title: End-to-End Encryption Implementation
userStories.description: As a security officer, I want user data encrypted during transmission and storage so that sensitive financial information is always protected.

userStories.title: Compliance Audit and Reports
userStories.description: As a compliance officer, I want to generate security and data handling audits so that regulatory standards are consistently maintained.
